Question
========

In regression, the adequacy of the model can be determined using using *r*^2^. When the slope parameter is equal to 0.5 and there s~x~ = s~y~ holds, then

Answerlist
----------

* R2 = 0.25
* R2 = 0.5
* R2 = 1

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* R2 = 0.25: Correct
* R2 = 0.5: Incorrect
* R2 = 1: Incorrect
